dcterms:creator: C. Yao
X. Bai
W. Liu
dcterms:description: A multilingual dataset focusing on oriented text lines with large variations of text scales and orientations. It consists of 300 training images and 200 testing images.
dcterms:title: MSRA-TD500

dcterms:creator: B. Shi
C. Yao
M. Liao
M. Yang
P. Xu
L. Cui
S. Belongie
S. Lu
X. Bai
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 8034 training images and 4229 test images with scene texts printed in either Chinese or English, captured from various sources including street views and posters. Multi-oriented words and text lines are annotated using quadrangles.
dcterms:title: ICDAR2017-RCTW

dcterms:creator: D. Karatzas
L. Gomez-Bigorda
A. Nicolaou
S. Ghosh
A. Bagdanov
M. Iwamura
J. Matas
L. Neumann
V. R. Chandrasekhar
S. Lu
dcterms:description: A multi-oriented text detection dataset focused on English text, consisting of 1000 training images and 500 testing images, with text regions annotated using quadrilaterals.
dcterms:title: ICDAR2015

dcterms:creator: A. Veit
T. Matera
L. Neumann
J. Matas
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing 63686 images, with 43686 images for training, 10000 for validation, and 10000 for testing. It is designed for text detection and recognition in natural images, presenting a diverse range of text.
dcterms:title: COCO-Text
